Package com.bankapp.models

Class Loan

java.lang.Object
com.bankapp.models.Loan
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Loan>
public class Loan extends Object implements Comparable<Loan>, Serializable
Represents a loan within the bank application.

      interest - the interest rate of the loan
      amount - the total amount of the loan
      repetRule - the repetition rule for payments
      type - the type of the loan
      startDate - the start date of the loan
      monthlyPayment - the monthly payment amount for the loan
      accountUsed - the account used for the loan

      Compares this loan to another loan based on the amount.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Loan>
      Parameters:
      other - the other loan to compare to
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this loan's amount is less than, equal to, or greater than the other loan's amount
